name: Wuhan
title: Wuhan - Traveling China like your home yard
overview: Wuhan is the capital of Hubei Province, located at the confluence of the Yangtze and Han rivers. Known as the 'River City', Wuhan is famous for its important role in modern Chinese history, beautiful cherry blossoms, and as a major transportation hub connecting North and South China.

highlights.attractions: Yellow Crane Tower, East Lake, Wuhan University Cherry Blossoms, Yangtze River Bridge
highlights.cuisine: Hot Dry Noodles, Duck Neck, Soup Dumplings, Fish Dishes
highlights.bestTime: Spring (March-April) for cherry blossoms and Autumn (September-November)

dishes.name: Hot Dry Noodles
dishes.description: Wuhan's most famous dish - chewy noodles with sesame sauce and various toppings.

dishes.name: Duck Neck
dishes.description: Spicy braised duck neck, a popular local snack and street food.

dishes.name: Wuhan Soup Dumplings
dishes.description: Delicate dumplings with rich broth and savory fillings.

foodStreets.name: Hubu Alley
foodStreets.description: Famous food street with traditional Wuhan snacks and local specialties.

foodStreets.name: Jiqing Street
foodStreets.description: Popular night market area with street food and local cuisine.

gettingThere: By Air: Wuhan Tianhe International Airport (WUH) with domestic and international flights
By Train: Major railway hub with high-speed rail connections to all major cities
By Bus: Long-distance bus services from neighboring provinces
gettingAround: Metro: Modern subway system connecting major areas
Ferry: River ferries connecting different parts of the city

activities: Morning: Visit Yellow Crane Tower for panoramic city views
Afternoon: Explore the Yangtze River Bridge area
Evening: Walk along the riverfront and enjoy local snacks
Morning: Visit East Lake scenic area
Afternoon: Explore Wuhan University campus (especially during cherry blossom season)
Evening: Enjoy local cuisine at traditional restaurants
Morning: Visit local museums and cultural sites
Afternoon: Explore traditional neighborhoods and markets
Evening: Experience Wuhan's night life and food culture
